Verses: 1 dhevan Ezhundharuluvaar, Avarudaiya Saththurukkal Sidharundu, Avaraip Pagaikkiravargal Avarukku Munbaaga Odippovaargal.
2 pugai Parakkadikkappaduvadhupola Avargalaip Parakkadippeer; Mezhugu Akkinikkumun Uruguvadhupola Dhunmaarkkar Dhevanukkumun Azhivaargal.
3 needhimaangalo Dhevanukkumunbaaga Magizhndhu Kalikoorndhu, Aanandha Sandhoshamadaivaargal.
4 dhevanaippaadi, Avarudaiya Naamaththaik Keerththanampannungal; Vanaandharangalil Erivarugiravarukku Vazhiyai Aayaththappatuththungal; Avarudaiya Naamam Yegovaa, Avarukku Munbaagak Kalikoorungal.
5 thammudaiya Parisuththa Vaasasthalaththilirukkira Dhevan, Thikkatra Pillaigalukkuth Thagappanum, Vidhavaigalukku Niyaayam Visaarikkiravarumaayirukkiraar.
6 dhevan Thanimaiyaanavargalukku Veeduvaasal Erpaduththi, Kattundavargalai Vidudhalaiyaakkugiraar; Dhurogigalo Varanda Boomiyil Thanguvaargal.
7 dhevane, Neer Ummudaiya Janangalukku Munne Sendru, Avaandharaveliyile Nadandhuvarugaiyil,(selaa.)
8 boomi Adhirndhadhu; Dhevanaagiya Umakku Munbaaga Vaanamum Pozhindhadhu; Isravelin Dhevanaayirukkira Dhevanukku Munbaagave Indhach Seenaai Malaiyum Asaindhadhu.
9 dhevane, Samboorana Mazhaiyaip Peyyappannineer; Ilaiththuppona Umadhu Sudhandharaththaith Thidappaduththineer.
10 ummudaiya Mandhai Adhile Thangiyirundhadhu; Dhevane, Ummudaiya Thayaiyinaale Ezhaigalaip Paraamarikkireer.
11 aandavar Vasanam Thandhaar; Adhaip Pirasiththappaduththugiravargalin Koottam Migudhi.
12 senaigalin Raajaakkal Thaththaliththu Odinaargal; Veettilirundha Sthireeyaanaval Kollaipporulaip Pangittaal.
13 neengal Aduppinadiyil Kidandhavargalaayirundhaalum, Velliyaal Alangarikkappatta Puraachsiragugalpolavum, Pasumpon Niramaagiya Adhin Iragugalin Saayalaagavum Iruppeergal.
14 sarvavallavar Adhil Raajaakkalaich Sidharadiththapodhu, Adhu Salmon Malaiyin Uraindha Mazhaipol Venmaiyaayitru.
15 dhevaparvadham Paasaan Parvadham Polirukkiradhu; Paasaan Parvadham Uyarndha Sigarangalulladhu.
16 uyarndha Sigaramulla Parvadhangale, En Thullugireergal; Indhap Parvadhaththil Vaasamaayirukka Dhevan Virumbinaar; Aam, Karththar Idhile Endrendraikkum Vaasamaayiruppaar.
17 dhevanudaiya Radhangal Padhinaayirangalum, Aayiramaayirangalumaayirukkiradhu; Aandavar Parisuththa Sthalamaana Seenaayilirundhavannamaai Avaigalukkul Irukkiraar.

18 dhevareer Unnadhaththirku Eri, Siraippattavargalaich Siraiyaakkik Konduponeer; Dhevanaagiya Karththarmanusharukkul Vaasampannumporuttu, Dhurogigalaagiya Manushargalukkaagavum Varangalaip Petrukkondeer.
19 ennaalum Aandavarukku Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga; Nammel Baaransumaththinaalum Nammai Ratchikkira Dhevan Avare. (selaa.)
20 nammudaiya Dhevan Ratchippai Arulum Dhevanaayirukkiraar; Aandavaraagiya Karththaraal Maranaththirku Neengum Vazhigalundu.
21 meyyaagave Dhevan Thammudaiya Saththurukkalin Sirasaiyum, Than Akkiramangalil Thunindhu Nadakkiravanudaiya Mayirulla Uchchanthalaiyaiyum Udaippaar.
22 un Kaalgal Saththurukkalin Raththaththil Padhiyumpadiyaagavum, Un Naaigalin Naavu Adhai Nakkumpadiyaagavum,
23 ennudaiya Janaththaip Paasaanilirundhu Thirumba Azhaiththuvaruven; Adhaich Samuththira Aazhangalilirundhum Thirumba Azhaiththuvaruven Endru Aandavar Sonnaar.
24 dhevane, Ummudaiya Nadaigalaik Kandaargal; En Dhevanum En Raajaavum Parisuththa Sthalaththile Nadandhuvarugira Nadaigalaiye Kandaargal.
25 munnaagap Paadugiravargalum, Pinnaaga Veenaigalai Vaasikkiravargalum, Sutrilum Thamburu Vaasikkira Kannigaigalum Nadandhaargal.
26 isravelin Ootrilirundhu Thondrinavargale, Sabaigalin Naduve Aandavaraagiya Dhevanai Sthoththiriyungal.
27 ange Avargalai Aalugira Sinna Benyameenum, Yoodhaavin Pirapukgalum, Avargal Koottamum, Sebulonin Pirabukgalum, Napthaliyin Pirabukgalum Undu.
28 un Dhevan Unakkup Balaththaik Kattalaiyittaar; Dhevane, Neer Engalnimiththam Undupanninadhaith Thidappaduththum.
29 erusalemilulla Ummudaiya Aalayaththinimiththam, Raajaakkal Umakkuk Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvaruvaargal.

30 naanalilulla Mirugakoottaththaiyum, Janangalaagiya Kandrugalodukooda Rishaba Koottaththaiyum Adhattum; Ovvoruvanum Vellippanangalaik Konduvandhu Panindhukolluvaan; Yuththangalil Piriyappadugira Janangalaich Sidharadippaar.
31 pirabukkal Egipthilirundhu Varuvaargal; Eththiyoppiyaa Dhevanai Nokki Kaiyedukkath Theevirikkum.
32 boomiyin Raajyangale, Dhevanaip Paadi, Aandavaraik Keerththanam Pannungal. (selaa.)
33 aadhimudhalaayirukkira Vaanaadhi Vaanangalinmel Ezhundharuliyirukkiravaraip Paadungal; Idho, Thamadhu Saththaththaip Balaththa Saththamaai Muzhangappannugiraar.
34 dhevanudaiya Vallamaiyaip Pirasiththappaduththungal; Avarudaiya Magimai Isravelinmelum, Avarudaiya Vallamai Megamandalangalilum Ulladhu.

35 dhevane, Umadhu Parisuththa Sthalangalilirundhu Bayangaramaai Vilangugireer; Isravelin Dhevan Thammudaiya Janangalukkup Belanaiyum Saththuvaththaiyum Arulugiravar; Dhevanukku Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga.
